description:
Non material minor amendment of planning permission reference P041872 dated 15 December 2006 for insertion of 'approved plans and documents' condition into the decision notice to read:-

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

Site location/ownership plan; 102; Planning Design and sustainability statement dated July 2004 (LBI Reg. No: 18721), Basement gross existing floor area (unnumbered), round floor existing (unnumbered) first floor existing (unnumbered); second floor existing (unnumbered); third floor existing (unnumbered) (LBI Reg. No: 18722), 03011/15-02-P001/A-004/A, 15-01-P400; Part L Evaluation (Draft 1) dated October 2004 (LBI Reg. No: 18723), Squire and Partners - Project Notes - Green roofs dated 21st October 2004; Bat survey dated October 2004.  (LBI Reg. No: 18724), Phase II Site Investigation dated March 2001; Ecological Data Search, by London Wildlife Trust dated 15th November 2004; Transport Assessment by WSP Development dated August 2004.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE: The reader is advised that this notice must be read in conjunction with the decision notice of the original planning application, reference: P041872 dated 15 December 2006. This letter inserts a condition listing the approved drawings for that original planning permission and cannot be read independently to the remainder of that 2006 decision notice.
